snippet.title: Digimon World Re:Digitize Opening English
snippet.description:
Hereby I present you guys the subtitled version of the opening to the new PSP Game "Digimon World Re:Digitize", which is a remake from the classic Digimon World 1 for PSX.

Enjoy. 

Every right on this video belongs to Namco Bandai, TRI-Crescendo and 24Frame.
Every right on the translation belongs to Romsstar. 
If you wish to translate this into other languages make sure to contact me first.
